attributes.title: Do not install this!!!
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, my phone wouldn’t stop glitching and the app crashed when I tried to open it. Shouldn’t be used as a news app as the information on it is heavily biased and minimally educational if it all. Horribly designed.

attributes.title: Horrible glitch
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to you know, ✨“Keep America great”,✨ but as soon as I downloaded the app my pets dropped dead 😿🐶 and my phone 📱✨started heating up and shaking until it exploded!🎆🎇 I’m sure it’s just a small glitch👾that they will work out but for now do NOT 🙅‍♀️🙅🙅‍♂️get this app.

attributes.title: ❤️❤️NO😡❤️
attributes.review: This app is TERRIBLE!! This app took daysss and daysss to download and I was waiting for ABSOLUTELY TOOO LONGGGGG. I HATE IT😡 So when I got it, it totally crashed my phone so I had to take it to the T-mobile in my town!!...and they had to fix my phone. This made me MAD, IRRTATED, AND ALL THE BAD FEELINGS IN ANY VOCABULARY!!! I swear I’m never downloading this EVER again😡😡 I would NEVERRRRRR recommend this app to ANY ONE...EVER!😡

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS!!!
attributes.review: If I could give this app a zero star review, I WOULD! I just downloaded it to keep up with our president’s goals and plans to make America great again, but I am extremely DISPLEASED. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS HORRIBLE APP. Ever since the download, my phone has glitched and began to die quicker. I think it’s collecting personal data to give to China. DON’T BE A SHEEP! THIS IS FAKE PROPAGANDA!

attributes.title: My reason
attributes.review: Well to start off I really dislike this but I’m trying to say it in the nicest way possible! It just didn’t work out for me, But still I think this is bad/meh. Remember this is my opinion! So it just might be my phone, So yeah this it my final opinion 1/100(my opinion)

attributes.title: This app made my hand fall off 🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app, the hand i used to touch it fell off. The glitches and bugs in this app make it unusable, just like my hand. I won’t press charges, but this app must be removed from the app store for the safety of the country. ❤️

attributes.title: Ugh
attributes.review: It doesn’t work and it was so bad it made my fish go blind smh. Bad review because it started to glitch my phone and made it very glitchy till i couldn’t even touch anything. Uninstalling immediately

attributes.title: Not 4 Me 😢
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to support my king, my savior, the one and only, Donald J Trump, however my mother saw the app on my phone and went into cardiac arrest and shortly after my father got hit by a train. I think this app has been cursed by witch liberals😡😡!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! En knee ways, the new 100 gecs album comes out July 10🥰 preorder now 💕

attributes.title: WOW. This app is bad.
attributes.review: Not only was it glitchy and had multiple bugs but after I gave the app my mobile number the it proceeded to call me. When I picked up, Some guy that sounded like Peter from Family Guy called me racial slurs. Very disappointed that trumpie would approve something like this.

attributes.title: Poor Management
attributes.review: This app has SO many glitches that it’s clear that very little effort was put into it. I tried turning the notifications that I receive off and I STILL get them somehow. Really hope the presidential election is run better than this app.
